Sentece: PRED-17-EC was further metabolized with a half life of 1.6 h to prednisolone.
Title: Studies on the pharmacokinetics and metabolism of prednicarbate after cutaneous and oral administration.

Sentece: The excretion rate was 5 to 6% of the dose applied to rats and maximally 1.9% in pigs.
